Options.Description: Check if you want to group objects using a property
Set the scriptname of the property you want to group objects by
Set the scriptname of the property used to determine Size or Volume. It must be an integer property
Set the node id of object you want to open the view when double clicking (usually last node)
Set a json object specifying the property, the value and the color (ex: {"property":"status", "values":{"t":"green", "d":"red"}})
